data.topic_title: "Artificially Intelligent Decision Making: Balancing Objectivity with Human Values"
data.user_input: "Artificially Intelligent Decision Making: Balancing Objectivity with Human Values"

structure.key_strength: Clear thesis statement and logical structure
structure.to_improve: Stronger conclusion needed and better transitions

user_transcript_evaluation.feedback: You've got a clear and logical structure to your writing - a strong foundation to build on. One area for improvement is to strengthen your conclusion, making it more impactful and wrapping up your ideas nicely. To help you with this, try brainstorming a few potential conclusions and writing a paragraph that ties everything together.
